title: Deluxe Living Room
description: A luxurious hotel room designed for your ultimate comfort. Includes modern amenities such as free WiFi, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and a mini-bar. Perfect for both business and leisure stays.

review.comment: An excellent stay! The room was clean and the staff were very friendly.
Loved the ambiance and service. Would visit again!

additional_information.policies: No smoking in rooms. Pets are not allowed. Free cancellation within 24 hours.
